Had I been present, I would have voted  YEA on Roll Call No. 172, H.R. 1998; YEA on Roll Call No. 173, H.R.  3394; and YEA on Roll Call No. 174, H.R. 3422. …previously scheduled  family commitment. My grandson, Thomas, graduated from Xavier High  School. The ceremony is at St.  Patrick's Cathedral in New York.
